items.title: Sausage Breakfast Burrito
items.description: A burrito made from four eggs, sausage, and cheddar cheese

items.title: Chorizo Hash
items.description: Chorizo sausage diced on top of hashbrowns sauteed with garlic, pepper, and salt.

items.title: Classic Morning Breakfast
items.description: Two eggs scrambled, two pieces of whole wheat toast, and two sausage links.

items.title: Gladiator Breakfast
items.description: Our signature Sausage Breakfast Burrito wrapped in bacon and wrapped in another Sausage Breakfast Burrito.

items.title: Cheeseburger Deluxe
items.description: Two 1/3 pound beef patties cooked medium-well and topped off with cheddar cheese in our patented two-bun technology.

items.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
items.description: A classic chicken caesar salad with ranch dressing.

items.title: Chicken Tenders
items.description: Four chicken tenders battered and deep fried. Classic deliciousness.

items.title: Steak n' Veggies
items.description: An 8oz. slice of premium steak, cooked medium-well, and offered with a side of roasted greens.

items.title: Fish n' Chips
items.description: Three large pieces of cod deep-fried in batter, nestled in a basket of fries. Served with tartar sauce.

items.title: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Chicken and noodles served in alfredo sauce.

items.title: Spaghetti and Meatballs
items.description: Spaghetti served with meatballs and a classic tomato sauce.
